Text: It's my - my opinion that the private sector, where five out of six jobs are, where you have permanent jobs, with the opportunity for advancement, is a better place than make-work jobs under the program recommended by the Congress.

That is a plan that has been analyzed by independent experts which said that it could produce 10 million new jobs.

They produce the most jobs.
